Package suncertify.db

Provides interfaces and classes for working with the DB interface and its Data implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DB This is the DB interface for Bodgitt and Scarper, LLC.
 

Class Summary
Data The Data class implements the DB interface.
 

Exception Summary
CreateFailedException Instances of the CreateFailedException class are thrown to indicate that a data record create() failed.
DuplicateKeyException Instances of the DuplicateKeyException class are thrown to indicate that the software has attempted to create a record that would create a duplicate key condition.
DuplicateKeyOnUpdateException Instances of the DuplicateKeyOnUpdateException class are thrown to indicate that a duplicate key condition would exist if the record was updated.
InvalidDataHeaderException Instances of the InvalidDataHeaderException class are thrown to indicate that a database header is invalid.
InvalidMagicCookieException Instances of the InvalidMagicCookieException class are thrown to indicate that a database file magic cookie does not match the expected value.
IOExceptionOnDeleteException Instances of the IOExceptionOnDeleteException class are thrown to indicate that an IOException was thrown during a delete().
IOExceptionOnUpdateException Instances of the IOExceptionOnUpdateException class are thrown to indicate that an IOException was thrown during an update().
RecordNotFoundException Instances of the RecordNotFoundException class are thrown to indicate that the software has specified a record that does not exist or is marked as deleted in a database file.
 

Package suncertify.db Description

Provides interfaces and classes for working with the DB interface and its Data implementation.
